segments.text: Get in slowly , sweetie . You'll get used to it . I'm gonna go and make you some chicken soup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know you don't have an appetite , but you need to eat something . You'll get too weak if you don't eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ... I'm sweating already . It's so hot . I can feel it boiling ! Can I get out yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good sign . But just soak a little longer , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2
